entry.title: monitor supplier confirmation
entry.content:
Hello Experts ,

when we create PO and enter supplier confirmations we are able to see that in Po .

but when we look into monitor supplier confirmations app we are not able to see the details of it .as shown in the below we can only see these details how do we see supplier confirmation details which available in PO.

entry.title: Need help in implementing "Multiple value selection" into "Value Help CDS view"
entry.content:
Hello Team,

I have requirement in SAP Public Cloud as follows –

I have implemented one CDS view Z_I_MATDOC_VH for value help for the standard field in which I’m fetching data from standard CDS view I_MaterialDocumentHeader_2. I have implemented necessary annotations in this custom CDS view.

There is another CDS  view Z_I_SELCTION for input selection. It has got 3 fields as follows –

-CompanyCode

-MaterialDocument

-MaterialDocumentYear

I’m using CDS view Z_I_MATDOC_VH into annotation -@Consumption.valueHelpDefinition : [{ entity: { name: ‘Z_I_MATDOC_VH’,

Element: ‘MaterialDocument’}}]

I’m also using annotation - @Consumption.filter.multipleSelection: true

The system is giving proper value help for field ‘MaterialDocument’.

But I’m able to select only one value from it.

My requirement is to select Multiple Values from the entries of Value Help.
Please help me with your suggestions and code snippets.

entry.title: Unexpected rounding occurs on the condition type TTX1 in PO
entry.content:
Although the rounding rule of TTX1 is Commercial ,  the condition value is always rounding off.

In this case,  tax rate is 10%, the rounding rule is set to Commercial, so the  last digit of the condition value will be rounded to:

15555*10% = 1555.5 → 1556, but the result is 1555 as shown below picture.

I'm using  SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508.

entry.title: Which API can be used to create Revision Levels?
entry.content:
Hello,

we are looking for some help finding the right API.

The manual way to create revision levels is via App: "Create Material Revision Level".

Which API can be used to do this creation of Material Revision Levels via our PLM system?

 

Thanks in advance,

Kerisha

entry.title: Advanced valuation - Self-defined grouping rules
entry.content:
Dear SAP experts,

I'm looking for some guidance on advanced foreign currency valuation in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud.

I've been working with the standard system, but I need to create self-defined grouping rules to handle some specific valuation scenarios. I'm aware of the predefined rules like 0PRE and 0FLB, but I need to know if it's possible to create a custom rule to group items based on criteria beyond the standard configuration.

According to SAP documentationns and this blog, the two standard grouping rules are:

  • 0PRE: This rule is used for cleared open items and groups together all open items cleared by the same journal entry.
  • 0FLB: This rule is used for not-cleared open items and non-open items and groups amounts by G/L account and currency

    Based on SAP help, we got the following definition for "Group ID" and there is a mention of a "Self-defined grouping rule" 

    Could anyone with experience in this area let me know if this functionality exists in the Public Cloud edition? If so, what are the steps or the recommended best practices for creating and assigning these rules?

    Any help or insights would be greatly appreciated.

    Thank you!

entry.title: SAP Public Cloud - Adobe Forms: Extend data source and layout
entry.content:
Hello,

I have some questions about forms in S4 Public Cloud. I hope you can help clarify my thoughts.

First, I wanted to know if there is a way to extend the data source of a form without having to create customer fields. My customer's requirement is to print data on the form that isn't in the data source. For example, to print data from the related delivery or the intercompany purchase order on the sales order. Therefore, I don't need to create custom fields; this information is already in SAP. I need to extend the data source and dynamically populate this extension with the necessary information. I don't want to create new customer fields in the database.

Another requirement from my customer is to group sales order items by material group. That is, they don't want to print items 10, 20, 30, etc. They want to group by the material group field and first print a header (Material Group 1) and below it all the items in that material group. Then they'll print another header (Material Group 2) and the items in that material group... In S4 Private, I would have developed this type of logic in the print/BADI program, form context, or form interface. But in S4 Public, I don't have any of these options. Can the data source be extended and a completely customized data structure developed by me be added? Are these types of groupings developed directly with Javascript in the Adobe form?

Kind Regards.

entry.title: How to cancel supplier invoice document which is created by ERS
entry.content:
Dears,
We want to cancel supplier invoice document which is created by ERS. (S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition) 
I use apps [Cancel Supplier Invoice Document]to do this, but the error message Msg M8414 appeared as below.
  「 Invoice document &&& && is created by ERS」

Could you tell me how to reverse supplier invoice document which is created by ERS?

Best Regards,
Lily
#Supplier Invoice Document
#ERS
SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition

entry.title: API for retrieving GL account master data
entry.content:
Hi Dear Experts,

Are you aware of any other methods to obtain the GL account master data besides the following API?

 https://api.sap.com/api/API_GLACCOUNTINCHARTOFACCOUNTS_SRV/overview

■Issues with the above API:
The scope items that need to be activated all have dependencies or require licenses for related products.

Please suggest.

Thank you very much.Best Regards!

SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Finance API Management API

entry.title: Payment Proposal File and Payment Settlement File missing Item data
entry.content:
During the Automatic payment run for suppliers, after the payment proposal is generated, the proposal download file has no item level details available. Only the summary balance displayed consolidating all the items in .xlsx format. 

All settings were selected; however, this proposal report does not bring across proposal items that make up the payment against the Vendors.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: How to update or maintain Multilingual Text for Equipment's/Functional Location in SAP Public Cloud
entry.content:
In SAP S4 Hana Public Cloud there is no app or transaction called Create/Change Equipment and Create/Change Functional Location, instead there is Create/Change Technical objects which support both equipment and Functional Location. However unlikely in SAP S4 Hana Public Cloud there is also no option for maintaining or changing the multilingual texts. 

But when doing the initial load through LTMC migration cockpit there is option to add languages.

Can anyone help to understand how to achieve this when creating manually or for updating.

entry.title: CDS View for Monitor Purchase Order Items
entry.content:
Hello All 

Im creating a CDS report and want to replicate some of the details in the "Monitor Purchase Order Items" app. I can see most of the fields required in the CDS I_PurOrdScheduleLineAPI01 but it doesn't have the Delivered Value and Invoiced Value. 

Can anyone assist with what views I can include into my custom CDS to get these values included? 

Thanks

Adam

entry.title: Maintain/Update Multilingual Texts in Equipment/Functional Location in SAP Public Cloud
entry.content:
In SAP Public Cloud there is no Create/Change Equipment or Create/Change Functional Location instead there is Create/Change Technical Object which supports both Equipment/Functional Location. In this app there is no option to maintain/update multilingual texts. Can anyone suggest how to do so?

While doing through migration cockpit we can add different languages but how to do and create/update so manually.

entry.content:

Thanks,
Prawin

entry.title: Dunning per Mail/Printing only if there is no Mail-Adress
entry.content:
Hello,

we want to dunn our customers and send the dunning per mail. Only if there is no mail-address in the BP master data, we want the dunning note to be printed. How do we have to define the output control settings?

I already checked the Output-Parameter information and it works, that dunning notes are being sent per mail. But we want the system to send it only if there is a mail adress in the BP master data. Otherwise the dunning note should be printed.

If i choose the settings in the determination step channel like this:

Output TypeRoleAccount TypeDefault Email AddressChannelExclusive Indicator
=DUNN_NOTICE  is not initialEMAILX
=DUNN_NOTICE   PRINT 

SAP creates only an E-Mail when there is a mail address in the BP master Data, which is correct. But if there is no mail address, no mail AND no print is created.

When i choose the settings like this:

Output TypeRoleAccount TypeDefault Email AddressChannelExclusive Indicator
=DUNN_NOTICE  is not initialEMAIL-
=DUNN_NOTICE   PRINT 

SAP prints ONLY when there is no mail address (which is good). But when there is a mail address, SAP prints AND sends a mail.

Can you tell me where i made a mistake? Is the column "Default E-Mail Address" the correct one? Or do i handle the column "Exclusive Indicator" wrongly?

entry.title: RAP Behavior extension of Production Order
entry.content:
Hello,
I'm trying to create behavior extension of Production Order. I found in business accelerator hub object that could help me.

I have checked in R_PRODUCTIONORDERTP if it is extensible and it is.


In the next step i tried to create determination so I've created class using wizard.

CLASS lsc_R_PRODUCTIONORDERTP DEFINITION INHERITING FROM cl_abap_behavior_saver.
  PROTECTED SECTION.

    METHODS cleanup_finalize REDEFINITION.
    methods determineTest for determine on modify
        importing keys for ProductionOrder.
*    METHODS map_messages REDEFINITION.

ENDCLASS.

CLASS lsc_R_PRODUCTIONORDERTP IMPLEMENTATION.

  METHOD cleanup_finalize.
  ENDMETHOD.
  method determineTest.

  endmethod.
*  METHOD map_messages.
*  ENDMETHOD.

ENDCLASS.

I don't understand why eclipse inform me determination is not allowed.

Is any other way to affect the value of the fields?

entry.title: Account Assignment Q (Project Stock) - possible for Services and for Orders without Material Number?
entry.content:
Hello,

i am trying to find out if there are any restrictions to the usage of Account Assignment P (Project Stock).

Is it possible to use Account Assignment Q (Project Stock) in Purchase Requisitions in the following cases:

  1. When procuring a Service?
  2. When procuring a Material with just a Material Group & Item Description but without Material Number?

Whenever we try to create a Purchase Requisition for Services or a Material without Material Number we receive the error message: "Document cannot be posted: For KTOSL = BSX, KATYP cannot be 01 MKPF / / $1 / 0000000001"

 

But i can not tell whether that is because the combination Q and Service / Q without Material Number is not possible or whether we are missing some customizing for the account determination.

 

Any input would be highly appreciated.

Best regards,

Kerisha

entry.title: How do I add international freight and insurance costs to a material's price in SAP?
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

We are having issues with processing international Purchase Orders (POs) in SAP. We need to create a single Purchase Requisition (PR) but use it to generate three separate POs: one for the materials, one for freight, and one for insurance. The primary challenge is ensuring the costs for freight and insurance are automatically added to the material's final price upon goods receipt. What is the correct configuration or process to handle this "landed cost" scenario while allowing for separate invoices from different vendors (material supplier, freight forwarder, and insurance company)

Best Regards,

Nithin Pranesh
